title:
The AI-Augmented
Technologist
bullets: The Business-First Builder: AI enables the domain expert to move from "requirements writer" to "solution prototyper."
Vibe Coding: Focusing on business intent ("Show me rebate leakage") rather than syntax. The AI handles the boilerplate.
Functional Wireframes: Using AI to instantly visualize user flows and data logic, iterating in real-time with stakeholders.
notes: Two-column split slide. Left ~50% is a dark navy/black solid panel with white title (large, two lines) and three short paragraph bullets (each begins with a bold label + colon, followed by regular-weight sentence). Add a thin, subtle horizontal divider line under the title spanning most of the left panel. Right ~50% is a full-height abstract tech image (blue/purple layered translucent curves with data/line accents). Keep generous left padding and consistent paragraph spacing.
